so the carbon dioxide in the beer it

called nucleation sites have you ever

out of like one single place on a glass
that's a nucleation site it could be a
fiber or dust particle on the glass an
imperfection or bump or even a tiny
trapped air bubble and that's what
you're trying to avoid by tilting your
glass while you pour your beer trapped
air that can then turn into nucleation

those little nucleation sites and

it gets coated in proteins from the

where it belongs in other words less
